LanguageData.RG_EnableRGForAI_Title: Enable Run And Gun for AI
LanguageData.RG_EnableRGForAI_Description: Enables Run And Gun for all AI pawns. Beware, this makes them incredibly deadly.
LanguageData.RG_AccuracyPenalty_Description: The accuracy is modified by this percentage while running and gunning. This applies to all non-player pawns.
LanguageData.RG_AccuracyPenaltyPlayer_Title: Player's accuracy modifier (Min: {0}% Max: {1}% Default: {2}% Current: {3}%)
LanguageData.RG_AccuracyPenaltyPlayer_Description: The accuracy is modified by this percentage while running and gunning. This applies to only the player's pawns. The two separate accuracy sliders allow for a handicap, in the event you mainly just want this feature for the enemy to use, for example, or vise versa.
LanguageData.RG_MovementPenaltyHeavy_Title: Movement penalty for heavy weapons (Min: {0}% Max: {1}% Default: {2}% Current: {3}%)
LanguageData.RG_MovementPenaltyHeavy_Description: The movement penalty while shooting for heavy weapons
LanguageData.RG_MovementPenaltyLight_Title: Movement penalty for light weapons (Min: {0}% Max: {1}% Default: {2}% Current: {3}%)
LanguageData.RG_MovementPenaltyLight_Description: The movement penalty while shooting for light weapons
LanguageData.RG_EnableRGForFleeChance_Title: Flee and gun chance (Min: {0}% Max: {1}% Default: {2}% Current: {3}%)
LanguageData.RG_EnableRGForFleeChance_Description: Chance that fleeing enemy pawns will use RunAndGun while fleeing
LanguageData.RG_WeightLimitFilter_Title: Filter heavy/light by weight limit (Default: {0} Current: {1})
LanguageData.RG_WeightLimitFilter_Description: Use the slider to set the weight limit that is used for the view filter.
LanguageData.RG_Action_Enable_Description: Enables running and gunning. Shooting while running causes an accuracy and movement penalty.
LanguageData.RG_Forbidden_Weapons: These weapons cannot be used while running.
